::Obfucious::
    "Eh?  Hmm?  Did you say something to me?  Oh.  Yes, fixing the ship.  
I'll do what I can."  He walks into the ship to the main computer which is 
still deactivated.  He finds an access panel and begins looking at the 
circuits.  "The circuits here are fine, if dusty, must be a break in the 
connections somewhere."  He wanders aimlessly looking for tools.  By the time 
he finds them he's forgotten why he was there and sat down for a nap.
